Verse 27 is the doxology itself :—“ Glory be to God.” More- over, God is described by his proper adjunct——“ the only wise.” And that this giving of thanks may be acceptable to God, it is offered in the name of the Mediator: for no prayers‚ and no thanksgivings, ean be acceptable to God, except through Christ the Mediator.
